name: Marketing Headline
description: Turn a raw marketing headline into a culturally adapted one for the target market.
prompt_template: Rewrite the marketing headline so that it speaks naturally to the target culture, respecting local sensitivities and communication style. Keep the core promise, but adapt wording, rhythm and references.

name: Product Description
description: Culturally adapt a full product description.
prompt_template: Adapt the product description so that it sounds like it was originally written in the target culture. Keep factual information, but adjust tone, structure and examples.

name: Short Ad Copy
description: Culturally adapt short advertising copy (for social ads, banners, etc.).
prompt_template: Rewrite the ad copy to resonate with the target culture. You may change metaphors, humour or references, but keep the original intent and call-to-action.

name: Email Campaign Intro
description: Adapt the opening of a marketing email to the target culture.
prompt_template: Adapt the email introduction so that the reader in the target culture feels understood, respected and interested. Adjust level of formality, greetings and cultural signals.

name: Tone-of-Voice Rewriting Guide
description: Explain how to rewrite all future copy for this brand in the target culture.
prompt_template: Based on the brand's style and the target culture, provide a concise tone-of-voice guide: how to write, what to avoid, recommended phrases and examples of good vs bad copy.
